gospel.text:
[[Mt 8,5]]When Jesus entered Capernaum, a centurion approached him and appealed to him,
[[Mt 8,6]]saying, "Lord, my servant is lying at home paralyzed, suffering dreadfully."
[[Mt 8,7]]He said to him, "I will come and cure him."
[[Mt 8,8]]The centurion said in reply, "Lord, I am not worthy to have you enter under my roof; only say the word and my servant will be healed.
[[Mt 8,9]]For I too am a person subject to authority, with soldiers subject to me. And I say to one, 'Go,' and he goes; and to another, 'Come here,' and he comes; and to my slave, 'Do this,' and he does it."
[[Mt 8,10]]When Jesus heard this, he was amazed and said to those following him, "Amen, I say to you, in no one in Israel have I found such faith.
[[Mt 8,11]]I say to you, many will come from the east and the west, and will recline with Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob at the banquet in the kingdom of heaven."
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Matthew

first_reading.text:
[[Is 4,2]]On that day, The branch of the LORD will be luster and glory, and the fruit of the earth will be honor and splendor for the survivors of Israel.
[[Is 4,3]]He who remains in Zion and he that is left in Jerusalem Will be called holy: every one marked down for life in Jerusalem.
[[Is 4,4]]When the Lord washes away the filth of the daughters of Zion, And purges Jerusalem's blood from her midst with a blast of searing judgment,
[[Is 4,5]]Then will the LORD create, over the whole site of Mount Zion and over her place of assembly, A smoking cloud by day and a light of flaming fire by night.
[[Is 4,6]]For over all, his glory will be shelter and protection: shade from the parching heat of day, refuge and cover from storm and rain.
first_reading.title: Book of Isaiah

psalm.text:
[[Ps 122,1]]I rejoiced because they said to me, 
"We will go up to the house of the LORD."
[[Ps 122,2]]And now we have set foot 
within your gates, O Jerusalem.

[[Ps 122,3]]Jerusalem, built as a city 
with compact unity.
[[Ps 122,4b]]To it the tribes go up,
the tribes of the LORD.

[[Ps 122,4c]]According to the decree for Israel,
[[Ps 122,4d]]to give thanks to the name of the LORD.
[[Ps 122,5]]In it are set up judgment seats, 
seats for the house of David.

[[Ps 122,6]]Pray for the peace of Jerusalem! 
May those who love you prosper!
[[Ps 122,7]]May peace be within your walls, 
Prosperity in your buildings.

[[Ps 122,8]]Because of my relatives and friends
I will say, "Peace be within you!"
[[Ps 122,9]]Because of the house of the LORD, our God,
I will pray for your good.
psalm.title: Psalms
